comments.body: We may want to document the use case for `PassThroughMessage` similar to the Scaladocs in the Kafka case, or document it in the main documentation. Otherwise it may not be clear when and why to use this class.
Good point, I'll add a section in the docs explaining that this allows to ack messages consumed without producing, and without the need for fan-out flows.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +20,24 @@      extends Envelope[M, PassThrough]

  final case class PassThroughMessage[+M <: JmsMessage, +PassThrough](passThrough: PassThrough)
      extends Envelope[M, PassThrough]
}
